title: [Large-scale] Improving Risk Awareness of Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer Syndrome (HBOC): Utilizing Self-Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational genetics concepts and general understanding of cancer risk factors
context.additional_context: Conducting smartphone-based learning in resource-constrained technological environments. A curriculum aimed at enhancing social health literacy.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain three major risk factors of HBOC (Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer).
Learners can analyze personal HBOC risk levels using provided self-assessment tools.
Learners can perform procedures to connect with appropriate genetic counseling services if identified as high-risk for HBOC.

resources: Regional Resource Database for Genetic Counseling
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
